0.text: The guild has been doing work on the caves. I guess they are trying to repair the maze?

opts.text: Maze? The caves are a maze?
Ya ive seen them doing work.

1.text: Ya can't you tell? The maze used to protect the Obsidian City. I guess the guild hopes they can controll the maze once they fix it.

opts.text: I guess I see it now. I'd imagine its easier to get around when it's broken.
I hope they can control it if they do. It's hard enough to get around as is.

2.text: Ya I know, I got lost for a whole two days last week.

3.text: Ya, I wonder how long it will take.

4.text: Ya the caves can be alot, you get used to it I guess.
